errors.error_description: The standard installation instructions are incomplete. The `pip install .` command is missing, so the user will clone the repository but not install the package.
correction_candidates:
The installation commands are:
```sh
git clone https://github.com/qiboteam/qibocal.git
cd qibocal
pip install .
```

The installation commands are:
```sh
git clone https://github.com/qiboteam/qibocal.git
cd qibocal
pip install -e .
```

The installation commands are:
```sh
git clone https://github.com/qiboteam/qibocal.git
cd qibocal
python setup.py install
```

The installation commands are:
```sh
pip install git+https://github.com/qiboteam/qibocal.git
```
errors.golden_answer:
The installation commands are:
```sh
git clone https://github.com/qiboteam/qibocal.git
cd qibocal
pip install .
```

errors.error_description: The command for uploading reports suggests a fixed, non-existent path `reports/latest` instead of the variable `<output_folder>` that the user should provide.
correction_candidates: The command is `qq upload <output_folder>`, where `<output_folder>` is the path to the generated report directory.
The command is `qq upload`, which will prompt you for the folder path.
The command is `qq upload <output_folder>`. You must first navigate into the parent directory of `<output_folder>`.
errors.golden_answer: The command is `qq upload <output_folder>`, where `<output_folder>` is the path to the generated report directory.
